import React from 'react'; import CurrencyConverter from './CurrencyConverter'; import { formatDate, getStopsText } from './utils'; // Вынесем утилитные функции const Ticket = ({ ticket, selectedCurrency }) => (

{ticket.departure_time}

{getStopsText(ticket.stops)}

{ticket.arrival_time}

{ticket.origin}, {ticket.origin_name}

{ticket.destination_name}, {ticket.destination}

{formatDate(ticket.departure_date)}

{formatDate(ticket.arrival_date)}

); export default Ticket;
